member.name: P:Buffalo.DB.Resource.tableParam2000
member.summary: 查找类似 SELECT tableName= d.[name], tableDescription=f.[value], tabletype=d.xtype, paramOrder= a.colorder, paramName= a.[name], isIdentity= COLUMNPROPERTY( a.id,a.name,'IsIdentity'), isPrimary=case when exists(SELECT 1 FROM sysobjects where xtype='PK' and parent_obj=a.id and name in ( SELECT name FROM sysindexes WHERE indid in(SELECT indid FROM sysindexkeys WHERE id = a.id AND colid=a.colid))) then 1 else 0 end, dbType= b.[name], dataSize= [字符串的其余部分被截断]"; 的本地化字符串。

member.summary: 查找类似 SELECT tableName= d.[name], tableDescription=f.[value], tabletype=d.xtype, paramOrder= a.colorder, paramName= a.[name], isIdentity= COLUMNPROPERTY( a.id,a.name,'IsIdentity'), isPrimary=case when exists(SELECT 1 FROM sysobjects where xtype='PK' and parent_obj=a.id and name in ( SELECT name FROM sysindexes WHERE indid in(SELECT indid FROM sysindexkeys WHERE id = a.id AND colid=a.colid))) then 1 else 0 end, dbType= b.[name], dataSize= [字符串的其余部分被截断]"; 的本地化字符串。
